titleStmt.title: The banner of injustice and endlesse oppression displayed to the worlds view, or, The case of John Rayment, citizen and baker of London, stated who for these fifteen years hath been causlesly, maliciously, and wickedly sued in the law and most unjustly persecuted and imprisoned in the Fleet by the wicked prosecution of one John Johns ... / published by Iohn Rayment.
titleStmt.author: Rayment, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
